summary: WHEN I WAS DRIVING ON THE FREEWAY- THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY STOPPED RUNNING. THERE WAS NO WARNING.  THE CAR CAME TO A SUDDEN STOP.  WHEN I RESTARTED THE CAR IT IS VERY SLUGGISH TO RUN.  WHEN IT IS IDLING IT APPEARS TO WANT TO STOP RUNNING.  WHEN YOU BEGIN TO MOVE FORWARD- IT HAS A HARD TIME GOING.        I HAVE TAKEN THIS VEHICLE TO PLANET NISSAN FOR THE PAST TWO YEARS- FOR THIS CONTINUAL PROBLEM-  THEY CONTINUALLY WANT TO DENY ANYTHING IS WRONG WITH THE CAR.
